cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 26th Nov 2025 (AWST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 26th Nov 2025 (AWST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Male Dorm
dorms.description: Male dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards. They offer male accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 6 Share male only dorm. Includes linen and locker.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Twin Cell, experience prison in comfort. For those looking for the truly unique experience. Stay overnight in a former prison cell.

Deposit only
